channel.title: XP mode on Chris Neales Blog
channel.description: Recent content in XP mode on Chris Neales Blog

item.title: How to get XP for free
item.description: I recently had a request to provide some instructions for newly transitioned users on Windows 7 on “Where is it in Windows 7 compared to XP”. Now I’ve seen lots of posts from people asking for install media etc. for XP. Now whilst this isn’t a solution for that explicitly it does give you an XP environment to test in. If you are lucky enough to have Windows 7 Pro/Enterprise/Ultimate. Then you can simply enable “Windows XP Mode”.
